title: There is absolutely no reward for consistently playing well in ranked
body:
This seriously needs to be improved, either by punishing players who always either go 0-10 or 10-0, or easing losses for players who consistently perform well.

It's frustrating to constantly lose games because the worst player turns the game into an unwinnable clusterfuck within the first 10 minutes.

replies.body:
This is happening in every fucking game. I'm something like 20 losses and 7 wins over the past two days. Last week, I was 30 wins and 6 losses.

https://i.imgur.com/Qa4FisF.jpg

The game is literally one big coin flip on which team is going to be feeding by 10 minutes. 

I've gone from G3 to D5, decayed to P3, climbed back to D5, decayed to P4, climbed back to D5 promos, and now I'm at 0 LP in P3. I have absolutely no control over the outcome of the game, regardless of consistently playing well.

Yeah, it's why I don't play ranked any more. It's a teammate lottery, and, regardless of how the system was **designed** to function, a lottery is how it **does** function.
My team just threw a 12 kill lead I gave them by repeatedly suiciding into the enemy ADC, who ended the game something like 21-3. This is fucking retarded.
Chasing  a pretty score does not mean you are playing well. This is an objective based game not a team death match Kills mean nothing if you dont use them to your advantage to obtain objectives.
